${ModID}:RapidStrike.NAME: Rapid Strike
${ModID}:RapidStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !D! damage again for every two of your other cards containing "Strike".

${ModID}:OrbStrike.NAME: Orb Strike
${ModID}:OrbStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike" times unique Orbs channeled.
${ModID}:OrbStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL If you have any empty orb slots, channel 1 random orb.

${ModID}:PatientStrike.NAME: Patient Strike
${ModID}:PatientStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals !M! damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike". When Retained, increase additional damage by 1 this combat.
